name: PWA Budget Tracker
description: Resource where users can easily track their money (purchases and deposits), both online and offline.

name: Note Taker Web Application
description: Resource where users can write, save, and delete notes.

name: README Generator
description: Resource that uses Node.js to prompt questions about an assignment for users to answer, and then generates a fully formatted README with their responses.
deployed: N/A (this is not a deployed application, but rather a tool for users to download and use on their own computers).
